head.title: Prerequisites to contributing

body:
#Prerequisites to contributing

#Technical

  • Minimum Node.js v8.7.0+, though we do recommend using the latest 8.x, 10.x, or 11.x Node.js releases.
  • Latest npm.

#Rules of thumb

  1. Never push directly to master (except when updating the CHANGELOG). If you need to change something — create PR, even if it's a one letter change.
